Title: The Old Sea Bell
Description:
A green-bronze bell on a salt-bitten frame. It tastes of storms and oaths.

An old ringer eyes you like a gull eyes bread.

Options.Text: (If rung) Take the cliff path toward the lighthouse.

Paragraphs: A green-bronze bell on a salt-bitten frame. It tastes of storms and oaths.
An old ringer eyes you like a gull eyes bread.
